```vue
<template>
    <div class="pad-l5">
        <ui-datalist class="d-block w-f2" v-bind="props" v-on="events"></ui-datalist>
        <pre>{{ selected }}</pre>
    </div>
</template>
<script>
import UiDatalist from './Datalist.vue';

let options = [
    'angular',
    'aurelia',
    'backbone',
    'ember',
    'meteor',
    'react',
    'riot',
    'stencil',
    'svelte',
    'vue',
];

export default {
    components: { UiDatalist },
    data() {
        return {
            selected: null,
            props: {
                options,
            },
            events: {
                'select-option': data => {
                    this.selected = data;
                },
            },
        };
    },
};
</script>
```
